article_title: The Latest: Sanders to push plan to hold banks accountable
article_text:
WASHINGTON — The latest developments in the 2016 presidential campaign (all times EST):

___

9:50 p.m.

Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders is rolling out a plan to hold Wall Street banks accountable. In a reference to Oliver Stone's 1980s film, "Wall Street," Sanders plans to say Tuesday that "greed is not good."

article_summary:
WASHINGTON — The latest developments in the 2016 presidential campaign (all times EST):___9:50 p.m.Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders is rolling out a plan to hold Wall Street banks accountable.
In a reference to Oliver Stone's 1980s film, "Wall Street," Sanders plans to say Tuesday that "greed is not good."
